task.summary:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'refs/remotes/PaperlessApp/v1-Ryan'
Conflicts: .idea/workspace.xml app.js model/billing.js model/complete_orders.js model/cooked_orders.js model/order.js model/order_item.js model/orders.js model/payment.js model/staff.js package-lock.json package.json routes/billing.js routes/orders.js views/index.ejs views/orders.ejs

Added fully functional user authentication via passport. Added role based authentication ie admin and front desk can view orders but other will be redirected to login. This has only been implemented in the order route with a possible plan to move it to its own route but for the time being take the passport code to your own routes and alter values for that route it redirect the role number to the correct route. Added registering a user which could be used in admin view but other than that it is mainly for testing purpose.
Added session storage for the user authentication via package.json.
So if using the previous version please update to this one as this fixes the issues with the system I was creating.
FIX Add bootstrap for login.ejs. Any errors with the authentication ie redirect not taking you to that page even with the correct user and password. Add error page with the error code or add a nicer format.
Add logout button with working url.
Any questions email me.
RL

Added dynamic data to Billing Page that reflects the order id. All areas of billing page now uses dynamic data where static data once was. Added associations to needed areas on billing.js Data posts to Stripe.
Fixed issue with order_item.js not correctly displaying the correct information due to missing index key Fixed issue with charge.ejs not having the correct data due to misunderstanding the JSON object (using charge.dataValues.total instead of just charge.total)
app.js will contain test relationships that have been altered when trying to get billing to work.
FIX Add data to the database but still need to figure out the correct relation with what needs posting. Order page needs to show relevant information ie items and price.
RL

MESSAGE.value:
Added all my files. Added database creation for billing.js. started work on passport authentication.
Added model features.
added a login.ejs for logging in.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'refs/remotes/PaperlessApp/v1-Ryan'

Added fully functional user authentication via passport. Added role based authentication ie admin and front desk can view orders but other will be redirected to login. This has only been implemented in the order route with a possible plan to move it to its own route but for the time being take the passport code to your own routes and alter values for that route it redirect the role number to the correct route.
